clear_essay_sentences.text: Humanity always had a lot of different epidemics; plaque in eighteenth century, flu in twentieth century.
Nowadays we have another problem - coronavirus.
Coronavirus is a new pandemic which had started at the beginning of 2020.
There are over six millions cases as for May 31, 2020.
The main factor is asymptomatic period which can reach two weeks .
I think we could prevent this epidemic if people were not obsessed with economics.
Government should close every kind of transport and declare total lockdown of every country.
But the majority believes that this will not affect them.
I think people should concern of it more seriously.
All of us should understand that if we would stay home for couple of weeks or maybe month, this pandemic will not become pandemic
In the end of essay I want to say that people should draw conclusions and not repeat the same mistakes in the future.

standard_markup.text:
Humanity always had a lot of different epidemics; plaque in eighteenth century, flu in twentieth century. Nowadays we have another problem – coronavirus.
Coronavirus is a new pandemic which had started at the beginning of 2020. There are over six millions cases as for May 31, 2020. The main factor is asymptomatic period which can reach two weeks .I think we could prevent this epidemic if people were not obsessed with economics. Government should close every kind of transport and declare total lockdown of every country. But the majority believes that this will not affect them. I think people should concern of it more seriously. All of us should understand that if we would stay home for couple of weeks or maybe month, this pandemic will not become pandemic
In the end of essay I want to say that people should draw conclusions and not repeat the same mistakes in the future. Stay safe.
